channel.title: A list of coupons and promotions I used to launch and kickstart my first website for under 100$
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I recently launched my first website with the help of some coupons and promotions I've been saving up for the past few years and wrote a blog post about it:
ttbooks.io/blogs/4
I posted it on reddit and was told that there might be some interest in this community so I decided to leave the link here.
Cheers
